entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
